distribution.text: Copyright Â© Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
An update for go-toolset-7 and go-toolset-7-golang is now available for Red Hat Developer Tools.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
Go Toolset provides the Go programming language tools and libraries. Go is alternatively known as golang.

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: go-toolset-7-golang (1.8.7). (BZ#1545319)

Go Toolset is provided as a Technology Preview.

Security Fix(es):

* golang: arbitrary code execution during "go get" via C compiler options (CVE-2018-6574)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed changes and information on usage, see Using Go Toolset linked from the References section. For information on scope of support, see the Technology Preview Features Support Scope document.
notes.title: Details

notes.title: Terms of Use

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: go-toolset-7 and go-toolset-7-golang security and bug fix update

notes.text: An arbitrary command execution flaw was found in the way Go's "go get" command handled gcc and clang sensitive options during the build. A remote attacker capable of hosting malicious repositories could potentially use this flaw to cause arbitrary command execution on the client side.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: golang: arbitrary code execution during "go get" via C compiler options
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: This issue affects the versions of golang as shipped with Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise 3. Red Hat Product Security has rated this issue as having security impact of Moderate. A future update may address this issue. For additional information, refer to the Issue Severity Classification: https://access.redhat.com/security/updates/classification/.
notes.title: Statement

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
For details on how to apply this update, which includes the changes described in this advisory, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

vulnerabilities.title: golang: arbitrary code execution during "go get" via C compiler options
